0.000000	night,
0.000000	Thomas
0.000000	sleeps
0.000000	soundly
0.000000	while
0.000000	a
0.000000	soft
0.000000	breeze
0.000000	blows
0.000000	through
0.000000	the
0.000000	curtains.
0.000000	That
0.000000	is,
0.000000	until
0.000000	he
0.000000	hears
0.000000	a
0.000000	noise
0.000000	coming
0.000000	from
0.000000	downstairs.
